function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Pressure differentials not maintained in AIIRs","Impact":"Increased risk of contaminant spread between rooms","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and calibration of pressure transmitters","Technologies":"Differential pressure transmitters, negative air machine","People":"Patients, healthcare personnel","Owner":"Facility management"},{"Description":"Difficulty in accessing patients in AIIRs","Impact":"Impaired medical care and monitoring of patients","Mitigation":"Installation of patient monitoring systems and door-lock devices","Technologies":"Video surveillance, patient monitoring systems, door-lock devices","People":"Patients, medical personnel","Owner":"Medical facility management"},{"Description":"Unintended door opening in temporary AIIRs","Impact":"Risk of contaminant spread and compromised containment measures","Mitigation":"Implementation of manual door control systems","Technologies":"Manual door control devices","People":"Patients, healthcare personnel","Owner":"Facility management"}]}
